title: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
summary: An epic high-fantasy novel chronicling the quest to destroy the One Ring and defeat the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
summary: The story of Bilbo Baggins' unexpected journey with dwarves to reclaim their homeland from the dragon Smaug.

title: The Silmarillion
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
summary: A collection of mythopoeic stories of the First Age of Middle-earth and the creation of Arda.
